name: Instagram Story Downloader - Media downloader
description:
Download Stories by username or link, Download Reels ,IGTV , Profile pictures, and photos!
Download any Instagram media type!
- Stories are supported to be downloaded by username or URL.
- Smart endpoint to recognize the type of media, one URL for all instead of connecting to a lot of endpoints.
- NEW - Backup method to avoid any problems!
- powered by strong servers
- The lowest latencny time in the market !!  
- affordable plans and high value (The #1 option on the market)
